verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:15
verses.text: Then Amnon hated her exceedingly; so that the hatred wherewith he hated her was greater than the love wherewith he had loved her. And Amnon said unto her, Arise, be gone.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:16
verses.text: And she said unto him, There is no cause: this evil in sending me away is greater than the other that thou didst unto me. But he would not hearken unto her.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 13:17
verses.text: Then he called his servant that ministered unto him, and said, Put now this woman out from me, and bolt the door after her.
